name: Primordial Jade Cutter
desc: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

customize.name: Key of Khaj-Nisut
customize.desc: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. They say that this can be used as a key to open the gate to a paradise that lies at the end of the ocean of sand.

customize.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

customize.name: Sacrificial Bow
customize.desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Xiphos' Moonlight
customize.desc: This ancient double-edged sword glimmers with moonlight. It is said that a now-silent Jinni dwells within it.

customize.name: Wandering Evenstar
customize.desc: This was originally a device used by researchers to observe and perform calculations on celestial phenomena. It serves as a conduit and catalyst.

customize.name: Dragon's Bane
customize.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

customize.name: Rainslasher
customize.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

customize.name: Kagura's Verity
customize.desc: The bells used when performing the Kagura Dance, blessed by the Guuji herself. The scent of the Sacred Sakura tree lingers on it.

customize.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

customize.name: The Stringless
customize.desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

customize.name: Sacrificial Sword
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Eye of Perception
customize.desc: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity of one's heart.

customize.name: Wavebreaker's Fin
customize.desc: A naginata forged from luminescent material deep in the ocean depths. It was once the possession of the tengu race.

customize.name: Rainslasher
customize.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

customize.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

customize.name: Everlasting Moonglow
customize.desc: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.

customize.name: The Stringless
customize.desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

customize.name: The Flute
customize.desc: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.

customize.name: Favonius Codex
customize.desc: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.

customize.name: Dragon's Bane
customize.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

customize.name: Favonius Greatsword
customize.desc: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.

customize.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

customize.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
customize.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

customize.name: Rust
customize.desc: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.

customize.name: The Flute
customize.desc: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.

customize.name: Eye of Perception
customize.desc: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity of one's heart.

customize.name: Favonius Lance
customize.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

customize.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
customize.desc: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

customize.name: Summit Shaper
customize.desc: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.

customize.name: The Unforged
customize.desc: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.

customize.name: Calamity Queller
customize.desc: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue light seems to whisper of countless matters now past.

customize.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
customize.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

customize.name: Jadefall's Splendor
customize.desc: A ritual vessel carved from jade that reflects the luster of the skies and the clear waters.

customize.name: Memory of Dust
customize.desc: A stone dumbbell containing distant memories. Its endless transformations reveal the power within.

customize.name: Polar Star
customize.desc: A pristine bow that is as sharp as the glaciers of the far north.

customize.name: Amos' Bow
customize.desc: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, the more powerful it is.

customize.name: Lithic Blade
customize.desc: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.

customize.name: Lithic Spear
customize.desc: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.

desc.text:
They say that when Liyue first arose, Rex Lapis once walked the land with a sword hewn from jade.
Despite the constant wear and tear of age, the jade edge, so bathed in blood, still retained a polished sheen as if brand-new.
The blood was washed away in the rain of a thousand years, yet the thoughts and grudges that gathered about it could not be so easily eliminated.
"Nephrite has the soul of the Bishui's gentle heart, and will in time cleanse itself of the remnant grudges within."
"But who will ease the agony that the jade itself feels for having become an instrument of slaughter?"
These words of a friend long-forgotten were both lament and sigh.
But the inexorable gears of destiny would drown out those compassionate words.
In the passing of many long years, many became mortal foes who once made merry together,
While those who betrayed one another or fought to the death would come to share a drink, their hatred dispelled.
So it was also with this precious sword, carved as it once was to be given as an expensive gift to a certain someone.
This jade too was once cut for love of peace and luxury.
When wine vessels are filled with blood, and when tender feelings are ripped asunder by cold ambition and reduced to dust on the wind,
Gifts ungiven and bonds unspoken will become sharp blades with which to cleave erstwhile friends.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Lead Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Jueyun Karst is the realm of the mighty and illuminated adepti. But other than the ability to control the elements of the world, Jueyun Karst is also home to three other untold secrets: Alchemy, Sigils, and Sub-Space Creation.

materials.name: Mist Grass Pollen
materials.desc: Strange spores created by Mist Grass in enclosed spaces. They are the Cicins' favorite food.

materials.name: Treasure Hoarder Insignia
materials.desc: A signet that proudly represents its owner's position as member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... Is being a thief something to be proud of?

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Mercury Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
With Fulu (Sigils), the adepti can store their power in the form of symbols, and with Waijing (Sub-Space Creation) they can fashion a cosmic paradise with the power of their minds. The manufacture of elixirs, however, has always been shrouded in mystery, for certain death follows for any who swallow them.

materials.name: Mist Grass Pollen
materials.desc: Strange spores created by Mist Grass in enclosed spaces. They are the Cicins' favorite food.

materials.name: Treasure Hoarder Insignia
materials.desc: A signet that proudly represents its owner's position as member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... Is being a thief something to be proud of?

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Mercury Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
With Fulu (Sigils), the adepti can store their power in the form of symbols, and with Waijing (Sub-Space Creation) they can fashion a cosmic paradise with the power of their minds. The manufacture of elixirs, however, has always been shrouded in mystery, for certain death follows for any who swallow them.

materials.name: Mist Grass
materials.desc: Well-preserved Mist Grass. Some would take advantage of the Cicins' love for the Mist Grass to control them.

materials.name: Silver Raven Insignia
materials.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Gold Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Elixirs are in fact pills made from metal alloys. They were created by the adepti, and are able to grant weapons transcendent powers. However, they are rarely seen in the world due to the hubris of the practitioners of martial arts, who prized the ways of combat over the paths of the adepti.

materials.name: Mist Grass
materials.desc: Well-preserved Mist Grass. Some would take advantage of the Cicins' love for the Mist Grass to control them.

materials.name: Silver Raven Insignia
materials.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Gold Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Elixirs are in fact pills made from metal alloys. They were created by the adepti, and are able to grant weapons transcendent powers. However, they are rarely seen in the world due to the hubris of the practitioners of martial arts, who prized the ways of combat over the paths of the adepti.

materials.name: Mist Grass Wick
materials.desc: A rare bundle of Mist Grass that gives off a faint glow. Those who carry it invite both the Cicins and misfortune.

materials.name: Golden Raven Insignia
materials.desc: A raven insignia that symbolizes the pride and the guiding principle of the Treasure Hoarders. Whether it's hidden amidst the vastness of the land or in the depths of the seas, as long as there are treasures to be hunted down, the spirit of Treasure Hoarders, who will stop at nothing to acquire them, will never die.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Primo Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
An elixir of the highest quality. It embodies a state of intertwining order and chaos, and is said to mirror how the world was when it was first created. Of course, a certain someone knows that this was not the case.

materials.name: Mist Grass Wick
materials.desc: A rare bundle of Mist Grass that gives off a faint glow. Those who carry it invite both the Cicins and misfortune.

materials.name: Golden Raven Insignia
materials.desc: A raven insignia that symbolizes the pride and the guiding principle of the Treasure Hoarders. Whether it's hidden amidst the vastness of the land or in the depths of the seas, as long as there are treasures to be hunted down, the spirit of Treasure Hoarders, who will stop at nothing to acquire them, will never die.

value.text: HP increased by <color=#37ffff>20%/25%/30%/35%/40%</color> . Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on <color=#37ffff>1.2%/1.5%/1.8%/2.1%/2.4%</color> of the wielder's Max HP.
